greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: coefficients of auxiliary Rudin-Shapiro polynomials A_{ns}(omega) written in descending powers of x.
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10200 (rows 0 <= n <= 200, flattened)
John Brillhart, John, J. S. Lomont, and Patrick Morton, Cyclotomic properties of the Rudin-Shapiro polynomials, J. Reine Angew. Math. 288 (1976), 37-65; see Table 2; MR0498479 (58 #16589).
maple: for n from 0 to 15 do lprint(h(n)); od:
mathematica: Block[{t}, t[0, 0] = 2; t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n - k, k] + Binomial[n - k - 1, k - 1]; Table[(-1)^k*t[n, k], {n, 0, 15}, {k, 0, Floor[n/2]}] ] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 26 2020, after _Jean-François Alcover_ at A034807 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 06 2012
